sqlMap.select: SELECT q.id, t.item_id AS itemId, p.file_id AS fileId, p.file_path AS filePath FROM oms.dms_vw_goods t, sup.sup_tb_file p, sup.sup_tb_item_file q WHERE t.item_id = q.item_id AND t.sup_id = p.sup_id AND p.file_id = q.file_id AND t.state = 'U' AND p.state = 'U' AND q.state = 'U' AND t.item_id = #itemId#
